{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2503.21703v1", "title": "Trivial source characters in blocks of domestic representation type", "summary": "Let $G$ be a finite group of even order, let $k$ be an algebraically closed
field of characteristic $2$, and let $B$ be a block of the group algebra $kG$
which is of domestic representation type. Up to splendid Morita equivalence,
precisely three cases can occur: $kV_4$, $k\mathfrak{A}_4$ and the principal
block of $k\mathfrak{A}_5$. In each case, given the character values of the
ordinary irreducible characters of $B$, we determine the ordinary characters of
all trivial source $B$-modules.", "main_category": "math.RT", "categories": "math.RT", "published": "2025-03-27T17:09:40Z"}
